Hi, I am wondering how exactly to write a Beanshell script.  I 
understand =
that a process method is required that gets a passed in 
Crawl URI.  Does t=
he script require a main method or a specific class 
name?

Specifically, I=
'd like to place it between the Precondition enforcer 
and the fetchers so =
I can allow specific folders to be ignored from 
robots.txt.  i.e. I'd like=
 to change the status of a CrawlURI from -
9998 to an "accept" code only if=
 it is in a specific path to all an 
images folder that is in robots.txt to=
 still be crawled.

By chance does anyone have an example beanshell script =
that would do 
this?

Thanks
Adam T.
